content.description: Climb the nicely featured solid slab and slightly less solid crack in the dihedral past 2 bolts to a good ledge.  There is still a bit of loose and poor quality rock in the dihedral to be mindful of.
content.protection: 2-3 sets of cams from yellow alien to 3 camalot.  A big piece or two is helpful but not required.
content.location:
Cougar Katie climbs a right leaning ramp and dihedral system near the right side of the Petrified Turtle Buttress.  It is the rightmost of the prominent ramps.

One 70m rope gets you to the ground from a 2 bolt anchor on the ledge - not sure if a single 60m would make it or not.

pathTokens: San Rafael Canyon - AKA Little Grand Canyon
